page.title: 13ACTIVITIES BY THE GRIMMER
page.content: The Grimmer is on the village green in Wickham Skeith. It is a large pond. It is a favourite place for children to play, adults like to fish at the waterside. We enjoy games of rounders. Boys and girls play. There are six or seven of us aged from 8 to 19. We use a tennis ball and a baseball bat. Sometimes we play non stop cricket instead. The Grimmathon is a special long distance race,a bit like a marathon only much shorter . You have to run three times around the grimmer. If you want to go in for the raft race you have to make your own raft first, then you have to row it across the Grimmer.
